markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dust of Disappearance](/Equipment.aspx?ID=242)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 570 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 135 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This powder shimmers like a thousand tiny motes of light. Activating the dust by sprinkling it on yourself or a creature within reach casts a 4th-level [_invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) spell with a duration of 1 minute on that creature. This invisibility can’t be negated or seen through by any spell of 3rd level or lower or any item of 5th level or lower.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Dust of Disappearance
